item.title: 'Game changing' release of Type Ia Supernovae data may hold key to the history of the Universe
item.description: A unique dataset of Type Ia Supernovae being released today could change how cosmologists measure the expansion history of the Universe.

item.title: Under-sea mountains are key 'hubs' for sharks
item.description: Under-sea mountains are key locations for predators -- with 41 times more sharks than the open ocean, new research shows.
